name: OrangeCloudLearning
0:
”Alexa, open orange cloud learning”
”Alexa, open orange cloud learning and teach me the days of the week”
”Alexa, open orange cloud learning and teach me two times table.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: orange cloud learning
des:
Orange Cloud Learning can help teachers and parents teach children/toddlers via Alexa.
As a parent some of us find it hard to teach reputation learning as we also require stimulation (seeing immediate results). The Orange Cloud Learning app can now replace us getting bored/being too busy/not very good ourselves to allow our children to learn at their own pace. Ask Alexa to teach you 2, 5 or 10 times tables, teach you the days of the week.
We appreciate all feedback and would love for some ideas on additional leaning requirements.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
